# Executive Summary

This Phase III study evaluated ABC-123 in 245 subjects with advanced disease.

The study did not meet its primary endpoint and failed to demonstrate clinically meaningful benefit.

# Study Design

This was a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study of ABC-123.

The study design was appropriate for the research question.
